text: "Razor's Edge" is a single by Meat Loaf released in 1983. It is from the album Midnight at the Lost and Found.http://mljs.evilnickname.org/meatloaf/singles/razorsedge.html#remix == Track listing == ===7" version=== # "Razor's Edge" # "Paradise By The Dashboard Light" ===12" version=== # "Razor's Edge (Remix)" # "Paradise By The Dashboard Light (Long Version)" # "Read'Em And Weep" ===12" Special Edition=== # "Razor's Edge # "You Never Can Be Too Sure About The Girl" # "Don't You Look At Me Like That (Alternative Version)" == Charts == {| class="wikitable" |- !
